DOC.detailed_description: This study aim bolster effectiveness Washington D.C. Quitline ( DCQL ) program addition web-based mobile EX ( mEX ) cessation support system . This mEX system design fill gaps quitline call ready access menu evidenced-based treatment component , also provide DCQL counselor detail information client ' ongoing progress cessation - two development constitute major advance standard quitline programming . With addition mEX , DCQL counselor able tailor advice outset call even identify counterproductive pattern would otherwise go unnoticed . This innovative extension previous work leverage expertise ecological assessment methodology behavioral informatics purpose dynamic relapse prevention support within context underserved community QL . The project additive two-group randomize controlled trial test whether addition mEX improve abstinence rate 1- , 3- , 6- , 9-months relative standard care provide DCQL . Participants 700 smoker contact DCQL randomize receive either standard DCQL programming ( N=300 ) DCQL plus MQE ( N=400 ) . Participants assign standard DCQL program receive 6 proactive QL counseling session free nicotine replacement therapy ( NRT ) . Participants assign DCQL plus MQE also receive mobile access MQE system via web-enabled cellular telephone provide study . Relative usual care , expect MQE improve outcomes improve delivery , utilization thereby effectiveness DCQL resource . Specific Aim 1 . Examine abstinence rate DCQL participant receive usual-care relative also receive mobile quitline enhancement . Relative usual-care control , mobile quitline enhancement expect improve 7-day point prevalence abstinence rate 1- , 3- , 6- , 9-months . Specific Aim 2 .
